DOC.brief_summary: This study carry find whether reduction vancomycin-induced kidney injury ( nephrotoxicity ) vancomycin give intermittent versus continuous infusion . This study recruit 220 subject 2 hospital period 3 year . Participants invited infection require prolonged vancomycin therapy ( > 10 day ) .
DOC.brief_title: Reducing Nephrotoxicity Vancomycin : A Prospective Study Continuous Versus Intermittent Infusion Vancomycin
DOC.criteria: Adults age 2180 year Documented infection require prolong ( > 10 day ) vancomycin therapy Creatinine clearance > 50 ml/min ( use CockroftGault equation ) Patient already receive 7 day vancomycin therapy Pregnancy Severe burn > 40 % body surface area Spinal cord injuries Participation another interventional trial previous 30 day Inability obtain informed consent
